text: Shanghai Metro Line 3 (formerly known as Mingzhu Line ) is a north-south metro line operating by the Shanghai Metro, connecting North Jiangyang Road Station in Baoshan District, Shanghai, China to Shanghai South Railway Station Station in Xuhui District. It is 40.34 kilometers long and has 29 stations. It was opened on December 26, 2000. == Station List == == References == Category:All articles with unsourced statements
title: Shanghai Metro Line 3
